name: Ufo Arena
description:
Grab your friends and  go on a 2-4 player crusade. Lead your space vessel which can only turn by colliding with walls and other ships to great shooty victories!

Controls are easy enough for anyone to pick up in one go but the skill ceiling can go very high in-spite of that.

Designed to be equally fun to watch and to play! 
(Huge, floppy ships )

Donations, while not needed, are very helpful and will let me focus more time on adding -

  1. More maps
  2. More Game modes
  3. Single player mode

Thank you for checking this game out :)
